thread.section_title: Imeiphoneunlock.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Imeiphoneunlock.com | imeiphoneunlock.com
thread.title: Gerard M

author: Gerard M
title: Gerard M
text:
Locked to Sprint USA...delivered as promised
I've seen the good and the bad reviews...I'll start by saying the process was simple and all the information you need to successfully unlock your device is given along with information explaining: stolen/blacklisted, carrier locked and iCloud locks... a lot of the bad reviews came from the people that didn't pay for premium services and if by simply reading what services needed to be purchased, according to situation would have aleveiated frustration.
I would definitely recommend this service and would personally use again in the future and will refer... took 7 days which I was completely fine with and I was able to check the progress of completion... thanks again for delivering as promised
2/1/2017.... update: iPhone is still unlocked after almost 2 weeks... no reverse on the carrier lock... very very pleased
